name: Blood Debt (RadiantInferno, Nyxi, Design Dialectics, JewelKnightZero, bittoboi)
name_original: Blood Debt (RadiantInferno, Nyxi, Design Dialectics, JewelKnightZero, bittoboi)
description:
Controls

WASD - Move
Space - Dodge (consumes health to use)
Left Click - Swing Sword
E - Interact with vendor (the brown capsule with spherical eyes)
(Window build) Alt+F4 - Quit

How to Play

Attack the enemy to kill it and steal its health.
Use health to purchase items from the vendor.

Notes

As you may be able to tell, this is very very early development.
Enemies won't respawn, and the upgrades currently don't do anything.
If you cannot see yourself in the centre of the screen, and can't move, then you are most likely dead.
